name: AFGPipePartHologram
comment: Hologram for constructing supports that pipelines can snap to.

methods.name: SetSupportLength
methods.comment: Set the height of the support

methods.name: GetSnapConnection
methods.comment: Get the connections the pipeline snaps to

methods.name: SnapToConnection
methods.comment: Snap this supports's snap connection to to the given connection.

methods.name: UpdateSupportLengthRelativeLoc
methods.comment: Updates the relative offset for mSupportHeightComponent based on mSupportMesh

properties.name: mSupportMesh
properties.comment: The most fitting mesh for our aim height.

properties.name: mSnapConnection
properties.comment: The connection conveyors snap to, used when placing a support automatically.

properties.name: mIsAdjustingLength
properties.comment: True if we've placed it on the ground and is working with the height

properties.name: mSnappedConnectionComponent
properties.comment: Compoent stapped to on another actor during placement

properties.name: mSupportLengthMarkedDirty
properties.comment: Used to determine whether the relative offset needs to be updated for the support mesh

properties.name: mSupportLengthComponent
properties.comment: The scene component for adjusting the length of the support.
